revised the requirements', 'for survival follow-up to allow for more frequent data collection; added a', 'Day 8 visit during Cycles 1 through 4 to allow for more frequent safety', 'monitoring.', 'MK-3475-604-09 Final Protocol', '23-Apr-2019', 'Confidential']['Product: MK-3475', '12', 'Protocol/Amendment No.: 604-09', 'Document', 'Date of Issue', 'Overall Rationale', 'Amendment 07', '03-OCT-2018', '; changed the alpha allocation', 'between the primary (overall survival [OS] and PFS) and key secondary', '(objective response rate [ORR]) hypothesis on the basis of accumulating', 'external data on PFS and os in immunotherapy-chemotherapy combinations', 'in small cell lung cancer to allow more alpha to be allocated to the primary', 'endpoints.', 'Amendment 08', '07-DEC-2018', 'the assumption for median PFS in the', 'control arm was changed to 4.3 months based on external data published from', 'other clinical trials; and the power and efficacy bound calculations were', 'updated to reflect the change in PFS median assumption and an alpha spending', 'approach.', 'Amendment 09', '23-APR-2019', 'Updated criteria for the final os analysis to be a minimum of 294 events, or 31', 'months from study start, whichever occurs later to ensure sufficient follow-up', 'time for the final os analysis.
